articles.title: Eighty million years of rapid evolution of the primate Y chromosome - Nature.com
articles.description: Comparative analysis of Y chromosomes across 29 primate species reveals rapid evolution and shows different patterns of evolution among regions of the Y chromosome during primate diversification.
